title: Tic Tac Toe
description: Play the classic Tic Tac Toe game against your friend or the computer. Line up three Xs or Os to win!

title: Rock Paper Scissors
description: A quick and fun hand game! Choose rock, paper, or scissors and see if you can beat the computer.

title: Memory Match
description: Test your memory by flipping cards and matching pairs. The fewer moves, the better your score!

title: Catch The Ball
description: Move the paddle and catch as many falling balls as you can! Simple but addictive gameplay.

title: Color Switch
description: Tap the screen at the right time to pass through matching colors. Test your timing and reflexes!

title: Guess The Number
description: Think of a number! The computer will try to guess it or you guess the random number it chose.

title: Snake Game
description: Control the snake, eat food, and grow longer—but don’t hit the walls or yourself!

title: Typing Speed Test
description: Measure your typing speed and accuracy. Type the given words as fast as you can before time runs out!
